description: This source file implements the PermissionsClient class which provides methods to interact with a gRPC Permissions Service. It includes methods for permissions enumeration, retrieval, granting, setting, revoking, deletion, authorization, and registration functionalities, with internal helpers for channel creation and gRPC status mapping.

classes.name: PermissionsClient
classes.description: A client class for interacting with a gRPC-based permissions service, providing methods for permission management and token retrieval.

methods.name: PermissionsClient(const std::string & endpoint,bool useTls)
methods.description: Constructor initializing the client with endpoint and security credentials.

methods.name: ~PermissionsClient
methods.description: Destructor for cleanup if necessary.

methods.name: std::string Endpoint() const
methods.description: Returns the endpoint URL.

methods.name: std::shared_ptr<grpc::Channel> CreateChannel(const std::string & endpoint,const std::shared_ptr<grpc::ChannelCredentials> & creds)
methods.description: Creates and returns a gRPC channel, either secure (TLS) or insecure, based on parameters.

methods.name: uint32_t EnumeratePermissions(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::vector<std::string> & filters,std::vector<std::string> & outPermissions) const
methods.description: Retrieves permissions for a given app and partner, filtered by provided permission filters.

methods.name: uint32_t Get(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions & outAppPermissions) const
methods.description: Gets application permissions details for a specified app and partner.

methods.name: uint32_t Grant(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::vector<std::string> & bundles,const std::vector<std::string> & permissions,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions & outAppPermissions) const
methods.description: Grants specified permissions and bundles for an app and partner.

methods.name: uint32_t Set(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::vector<std::string> & bundles,const std::vector<std::string> & includes,const std::vector<std::string> & excludes,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions & outAppPermissions) const
methods.description: Sets permissions with included and excluded filter lists for an app.

methods.name: uint32_t Revoke(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::vector<std::string> & bundles,const std::vector<std::string> & permissions,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions & outAppPermissions) const
methods.description: Revokes specified permissions and bundles for an app and partner.

methods.name: uint32_t Delete(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId) const
methods.description: Deletes permissions for a given app and partner.

methods.name: uint32_t Authorize(const std::string & sessionToken,const std::vector<std::string> & filters,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<std::string> & outPermissions) const
methods.description: Authorizes permissions based on a session token and filters, returning authorized permissions.

methods.name: uint32_t GetAllForApp(const std::string & app,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions> & outList) const
methods.description: Retrieves all permissions associated with a specific application.

methods.name: uint32_t GetAllAppKeys(const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<ottx::permission::AppKeys> & outKeys) const
methods.description: Retrieves all application keys accessible with the provided credentials.

methods.name: uint32_t GetThorToken(const std::string & app,const std::string & contentProvider,const std::string & deviceSessionId,const std::string & appSessionId,const std::string & tokenMode,int32_t ttl,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::string & outToken) const
methods.description: Obtains a Thor token for a particular content provider and session parameters.

methods.name: uint32_t GetRegisteredPermissions(const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<ottx::permission::Permission> & outPermissions) const
methods.description: Fetches the list of registered permissions.

methods.name: uint32_t RegisterPermissions(const std::vector<ottx::permission::Permission> & permissions,bool replaceAll,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId) const
methods.description: Registers new permissions, optionally replacing existing ones.

methods.name: uint32_t DeleteRegisteredPermission(const ottx::permission::Permission & permission,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId) const
methods.description: Deletes a specific registered permission.
